CA_CE_CONCESSIONAIRE_PROFILE.ADDRESS: Covent House New Covent Garden Market London SW8 5NX

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: Provision of a rolling programme or maintenance works for the mechanical plant and equipment at New Covent Garden Market

REASON_CONTRACT_LAWFUL.P: The redevelopment of the New Covent Garden Market site is due to commenced in 2014 with the appointment of a private development partner in 2012 and will continue for a period of 5-7 years. The site must remain operational requiring the PDP to construct the new market around the existing market. This will be achieved through a phased construction approach to be refined during 2018 and will be a core deliverable through this period requiring detailed understanding of the existing services, reduced maintenance obligations to current systems and increased requirements to temporary systems making it absolutely necessary EN Standard form 15 - Voluntary ex ante transparency notice 14 / 16 to award the contract to Atmosclear Building Services who are the current contractors. The present contract for mechanical maintenance runs out in 2018, and the knowledge of the current contractors will be critical in achieving a minimum impact on the daily running of the market during the period of the redevelopment. A change of contractor would lead to a loss of crucial detailed technical knowledge of the site and its infrastructure, thereby undermining the success of the redevelopment project. The detailed requirements of the phasing of the redevelopment and the detailed design of the build are not confirmed. Therefore it is technically impractical to adequately scope the contract service requirements for a procurement process, whilst also delivering agreed quality and cost certainty from both a tender and operational perspective. Accordingly, the present circumstances fall within article 31 of Directive 2004/18/EC, in that for technical reasons the contract may be awarded only to a particular economic operator, namely the present contractors, Atmosclear Building Services Ltd

CONTACT_DATA_WITHOUT_RESPONSIBLE_NAME.ADDRESS: Twyford Court Hampstead Lane, Yalding, Nr Maidstone, Kent ME18 6HG
